episodes.name: Constant Crisis: The Path To Landman
episodes.overview:
DVD/Blu-Ray Featurette

(Cannot Add BD/DVD Release Unsure how can confirm its in the same order as aired.)

episodes.name: 'Death and a Sunset' Behind the Story
episodes.overview: The cast breaks down the epic season 2 premiere "Death and a Sunset."

episodes.name: 'Sins of the Father' Behind the Story
episodes.overview: The relationships between T.L., Tommy, and Cooper are front and center in "Sins of the Father." The cast dives in to season 2, episode 2.

episodes.name: Landman
episodes.overview: Set in the boomtowns of Texas, a modern tale of fortune seeking amongst roughnecks and billionaires in the world of oil.

episodes.name: Dreamers and Losers
episodes.overview: Tommy deals with the aftermath of a tragedy at the oil patch. Dynamics are disrupted when Ainsley moves into the oil house.

episodes.name: Hell Has a Front Yard
episodes.overview: Cooper makes an impression at the oil patch. Things get complicated for Tommy when his ex-wife Angela comes to town.

episodes.name: The Sting of Second Chances
episodes.overview: After a rocky first impression, Rebecca comes to Tommy's defense. Cooper gets an unexpected call.

episodes.name: Where is Home
episodes.overview: Tommy and his crew receive an unwelcome visit at the patch. Angela hosts family dinner at the oil house.

episodes.name: Beware The Second Beating
episodes.overview: Angela is caught off-guard when visiting Victor. The Norris family rallies around Cooper during his greatest time of need.

episodes.name: All Roads Lead To A Hole
episodes.overview: Tommy's cartel problem continues to escalate. Meanwhile, Angela and Ainsley get to know their community.

episodes.name: Clumsy, This Life
episodes.overview: Tommy gets connected to the National Guard. Rebecca becomes increasingly suspicious of Cooper.

episodes.name: WolfCamp
episodes.overview: After a health scare, Monty puts Tommy in a tough position. Cooper comes up with a plan.

episodes.name: The Crumbs of Hope
episodes.overview: Tommy and Cami discuss whether to gamble or play it safe. The cartel makes a move.

episodes.name: Death and a Sunset
episodes.overview: Tommy navigates a tense landscape as Cami asserts control.

episodes.name: Sins of the Father
episodes.overview: Cami is blindsided; Tommy warns Cooper about his shady entanglements.

episodes.name: Almost a Home
episodes.overview: Tommy confronts Cami about finances. Cooper's success draws attention.

episodes.name: Dancing Rainbows
episodes.overview: A tragic crash sets off a day of reckoning for the Norris family.

episodes.name: The Pirate Dinner
episodes.overview: Tommy juggles multiple crises; Angela throws a dinner to welcome T.L.

episodes.name: Dark Night of the Soul
episodes.overview: Tommy negotiates a risky offshore drilling deal as tensions rise with Cami.

episodes.name: Forever is an Instant
episodes.overview: Tommy and Angela's getaway turns chaotic; Cami's plans face scrutiny.

episodes.name: Handsome Touched Me
episodes.overview: Tommy hires help for his father as Cami makes a risky move.

episodes.name: Plans, Tears and Sirens
episodes.overview: Angela rescues Ainsley; Cooper asserts his leadership at a drill site.

episodes.name: Tragedy and Flies
episodes.overview: Amid the chaos, Tommy regroups with Cooper.
